com.krobothsoftware.psn

Class TrophyCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.psn.TrophyCalculator

  • public final class TrophyCalculator
extends Object
    Used for calculating psn trophy progress, points, and levels. Special Thanks for morphingryno's guide Trophy Guide
    Since:
    Nov 25 2012
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kyle Kroboth

    • Method Detail

      • getLevel

        public static int getLevel(int points)
        Gets the level from giving points. Because this method returns an integer, the level is ceiled. i.e., 
         13.589 = 14 level
        Parameters:
        points -
        Returns:
        level

      • getProgress

        public static double getProgress(int points)
        Gets the progress from giving points. This gets the progress for current level of points.
        Parameters:
        points -
        Returns:
        progress in percentage

      • getGameProgress

        public static double getGameProgress(int achievedPoints,
                     int totalPoints)
        Gets the game progress rom achievedPoints and totalPoints. Normally it's 
         A / T * 100
        to get the progress but 180(Platinum) must be subtracted from T first 
         A / (T - 180) * 100
 correct expression
        Parameters:
        achievedPoints - the achieved points
        totalPoints - the total points
        Returns:
        the game progress

      • getTrophyPoints

        public static int getTrophyPoints(int bronze,
                  int silver,
                  int gold,
                  int platinum)
        Calculates the trophy points for given trophy types

        Trophy Points 

         Platinum: 180
         Gold: 90
         Silver: 30
         Bronze: 15
        Parameters:
        bronze -
        silver -
        gold -
        platinum -
        Returns:
        points

      • getLevelPoints

        public static int getLevelPoints(int level)
        Gets base points for given level
        Parameters:
        level -
        Returns:
        points from level

      • getProgressPoints

        public static int getProgressPoints(int level,
                    int progress)
        Gets the points from level and progress 
         *LVL* are points for level
 (NEXT_LVL - LVL) * 100 + LVL
        Parameters:
        level -
        progress -
        Returns:
        points
